tasks.task_description: Update pitch detection to use Aubio with 4096 buffer

description: Implement Aubio.js as primary pitch detector replacing Pitchy.js
context: Added Aubio.js library to index.html before Pitchy.js
Updated pitch detection to use Aubio.js as primary detector with 4096 buffer, Pitchy.js as fallback. Aubio returns 0 for no pitch detected.
Implementation complete. Aubio.js now primary pitch detector with 4096 buffer, ready for testing.
